name: Generationship
description:
A Generationship sets off to settle humanity on a new planet.
An almost realistic survival management simulation game.

The game is still in Development, for now its for free and we would be happy, if you try it out and leave some comments.

Development Status

The basics of the game are done, but still far away from playable, due to there is no real target yet. I'm polishing the current state at the moment. Following stuff is done:

  • Realtime Simulation
    • Very high speed simulation (up to months/s)
    • TimeWarp to jump to specific events
    • Interupt for important things (e.g. person is dying)
  • Realistic Simulation
    • Try to do as physical correct as possible
    • Resources are just converted
    • Also a basic Metabolism is used
  • Construction system with infrastructure and Buildings
  • Resource Management
  • Manage Crew
  • Resupply from Earth
  • Artificial Gravity
  • Background Music and Ambient sounds
Used Technology
  • Current Version of Unity
  • Unity Universal Rendering Engine
  • Unity Job with Burst Systems
  • Unitys new UI System
  • Blender
Further Plan
  • Mid of 2021: Year pushing forward
  • End of 2021: going in Early Access with "Moon Missions"
  • End of 2022: Polished Release of Stage 1: "Leaving Earth"
  • Further  Stage 2: Flying in our Sunsystem
  • Further Stage 3: Leaving our Sunsystem, Flying in other Sunsystems
  • Further Stage 4: Build new Colony
Who Am I:

A solo developer, working on that game since start of 2020 at fulltime.
